node.title: Late Night: Putin and Biden’s Call Could Have Been an Email
node.alt: Stephen Colbert joked that “the only way to resolve a delicate situation that requires crystal-clear communication is two old men on a Zoom.”
node.description: The two-hour video call was a hot topic on late night Tuesday.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "President Biden and President Vladimir V. Putin spoke in a video call on Tuesday, discussing the potential Russian invasion of Ukraine.", "\u201cMakes sense \u2014 the only way to resolve a delicate situation that requires crystal-clear communication is two old men on a Zoom,\u201d Stephen Colbert joked on Tuesday night.", "J.B. Smoove, guest host of \u201cJimmy Kimmel Live,\u201d demanded the two Black audience members move up to the front during his monologue.", "Mariah Carey, queen of Christmas, will pop by Wednesday\u2019s \u201cLate Late Show.\u201d", "\u201cSummer of Soul,\u201d \u201cThe Power of the Dog\u201d and \u201cWest Side Story\u201d are among the best films of 2021."]
